Articles.Content:
Hi!

I'm a relatively new player to KSP who had watched over others' backs as they played but not really tried it myself. 

I bought the game on Steam a little while ago and made orbit on my first try, if you can believe it. (I had a little help though).

Anyways, I don't think I will be here a whole lot as I have a very good IRL resource to ask questions to, but if there are any scientific discussions about things I might put in a word, I have a bit of a background there ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

If that guy who streams in 360p is around, your beard is cute.

Ohai there.

Welcome to the forums. Now you will feel my pain...MUST...CHECK...IF...SOMEONE...REPLIED.

hello!

Small trick: the forum games section is a good place to procrastinate, I speak by experience.

The small disavantage is that you will feel the pain of duodex ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

I may regret using a facecam on Twitch one of these days.

Also ohai.

Welcome. My post here is your first real welcome, if you accept that Mods don't count. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Have fun, and post often. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Welcome. My post here is your first real welcome, if you accept that Mods don't count. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> Have fun, and post often. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

MODS DON'T COUNT! What do you mean, mods don't count! Mods make this game great! Plus, I'm developing one: [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128071-Mad-Rocket-Speed%21-OP-nukes-for-testing-purposes](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/128071-Mad-Rocket-Speed%21-OP-nukes-for-testing-purposes)

GRIN 

You'd better make a good one or you'll have the mods mods on yer back.
